AD_Summoned.synopsis: Ogres speak ADs when summoned into battle.They are hungry and ready to tear their targets apart

AD.synopsis: Three ogres have a meal time discussion. Chock and Fank are stupid. Lump is smart.

AfterSummon.synopsis: You have agreed to summon ogres up to three times for the to help you in battle. These are the leader's conversation with you each time. THis is... complicated because there could be many deals in play.
AfterSummon.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto 13.39, 32.93, 381.38 (Inside the school building)4. Speak to Lump, convince him to work for you. He will give player a horn.5. Trigger a battle (anywhere will do)6. Use the horn to summon the ogres.7. killcombat8. After battle is done, Lump will approach player to initiate dialog

PAD_NotReturning.synopsis: Player Blows ogre horn, but no one comes.

Spotted.synopsis:
Three ogres are eating remains and arguing about what the remains taste like..Then they spy the player, who needs to prove themselves to keep from being eaten.

Two of them are stupid, like most ogres. One of them, Lump, is very smart after accidentally eating a headband of intellect. His voice should be deep, and he should sounds lascivious in the way he speaks of food.

AD_Summoned_0.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AD_Summoned_0.text: Behold, brother, and take your fill!

AD_Summoned_11.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AD_Summoned_11.text: You heard the horn. Eat up, brother!

AD_Summoned_4.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AD_Summoned_4.text: Stuff your belly, brother - the feast's begun!

AD_Summoned_6.speaker: Chock
AD_Summoned_6.context: NodeContext: Calling aloud like a war cry!

AD_Summoned_17.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AD_Summoned_17.text: Behold, brother, and take your fill!

AD_Summoned_15.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AD_Summoned_15.text: Stuff your belly, brother - the feast's begun!

AD_Summoned_3.speaker: Chock
AD_Summoned_3.context: NodeContext: Calling aloud like a war cry!

AD_Summoned_16.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AD_Summoned_16.text: The horn's been blown - and my belly's ready!

AD_1.speaker: Chock
AD_1.text: Dwarf better. Dwarf sweet like honey.

AD_4.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AD_4.text: Must you? This inane chatter pains me.

AD_3.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AD_3.text: Oh, for... shut mouth! Head hurt!
AD_3.context: NodeContext: He is exasperated. Then he speaks in typical ogre speak.

AfterSummon_26.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_26.text: Well that's that! I've but one last battle in me.

AfterSummon_100.speaker: Player
AfterSummon_100.text: Agreed. I'll have need of you again. ([6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54]).

AfterSummon_36.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_36.text: A feast for the ages, then!
AfterSummon_36.context: NodeContext: ‘A feast for the ages then!’ Lump lifting his arms up just above shoulder height, then lowering them to clutch his belly in anticipation of the food he will eat.

AfterSummon_113.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_113.text: Call when you're ready, my morsel - and not a moment before.
AfterSummon_113.context: NodeContext: ‘And not a moment before, lump holds his gaze on the player as he turns his back to leave.

AfterSummon_32.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_32.context: NodeContext: Lump has his hands wide, stepping forward a tad. Looking around himself as if he expects to money soon.

AfterSummon_150.speaker: Wyll
AfterSummon_150.text: You didn't think this through, did you?

AfterSummon_15.speaker: Lae'zel
AfterSummon_15.text: It's as I feared. You've lost your senses.

AfterSummon_101.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_101.text: It was an absolute pleasure doing business.
AfterSummon_101.context: NodeContext: *dupe* [Lump The Enlightened] lump takes gold and puts it in inventory <JACK OF>

AfterSummon_132.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_132.text: How about a lick of that mouth-watering meat of yours. A parting gift, as it were.

AfterSummon_107.speaker: Narrator
AfterSummon_107.text: *Reality hits. You've been outsmarted by an ogre.*
AfterSummon_107.context: NodeContext: *dupe* [Lump The Enlightened] lump takes gold and puts it in inventory <JACK OF>

AfterSummon_47.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_47.text: That's that, then. Let's see the gold.
AfterSummon_47.context: NodeContext: You have reached the end of the road with Lump, he has little patience left and his greed is now showing.

AfterSummon_81.speaker: Wyll
AfterSummon_81.text: You didn't think this through, did you?
AfterSummon_81.context: NodeContext: Wyll brings her hand to forehead. Rubbing her front lobes in disappointed disbelief.

AfterSummon_25.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_25.text: Well I'll be. I almost expected you to back out of our bargain.
AfterSummon_25.context: NodeContext: *dupe* [Lump The Enlightened] lump takes gold and puts it in inventory <JACK OF>

AfterSummon_20.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_20.text: I'm afraid I've but one last battle in me. Shall we renew our contract once more?

AfterSummon_53.speaker: Player
AfterSummon_53.text: Fine. Your fee now, to fight for me when I call. ([6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

AfterSummon_8.speaker: Player
AfterSummon_8.text: I'll increase your fee - to be paid after the next fight. ([5dac5eea-faeb-459c-b675-46c51519b784])

AfterSummon_45.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_45.text: Oh-ho! I appreciate your zeal - but I think we've all learned a lesson here about risk, yes?

AfterSummon_59.speaker: Lae'zel
AfterSummon_59.text: It's as I feared. You've lost your senses.

AfterSummon_114.speaker: Narrator
AfterSummon_114.text: *Reality dawns. You've been outsmarted by an ogre.*
AfterSummon_114.context: NodeContext: *dupe* [Lump The Enlightened] lump takes gold and puts it in inventory <JACK OF>

AfterSummon_76.speaker: Player
AfterSummon_76.text: My battles aren't done. Hold out until the next, and it'll be worth your while. ([5dac5eea-faeb-459c-b675-46c51519b784])

AfterSummon_144.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_144.text: Indeed? A risky bargain - but one I must accept.
AfterSummon_144.context: NodeContext: Lump is taken aback by your proposal

AfterSummon_87.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_87.text: I'm calling your bluff. Pay up. Now.

AfterSummon_74.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_74.text: So our terms have concluded, my little morsel. But there's one last favour I might ask:
AfterSummon_74.context: NodeContext: Arms reaching out, almost as if he is stretching and tired of the situation. ‘But theres one…’ his head tilts with his proposal.

AfterSummon_7.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_7.text: A lick of that mouth-watering meat of yours. A parting gift, as it were.

AfterSummon_52.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_52.context: NodeContext: *Dupe* [Lump The Enlightened]  Rubbing for finger and thumb together illuding to the oger wanting gold. <JACK OF>

AfterSummon_119.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_119.context: NodeContext: *Dupe* [Lump The Enlightened]  Rubbing for finger and thumb together illuding to the oger wanting gold. <JACK OF>

AfterSummon_106.speaker: Player
AfterSummon_106.text: Lets. Take this and be ready when I call again. ([6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

AfterSummon_24.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_24.text: You summon, you pay. That's the bargain.
AfterSummon_24.context: NodeContext: Lump The Enlightened] finger point

AfterSummon_138.speaker: Player
AfterSummon_138.text: What use does an ogre have for gold?

AfterSummon_35.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_35.text: Is gold not the pilot of our world-vessel? I am a proud glutton - and not just for meat.
AfterSummon_35.context: NodeContext: Lump gestures with his hands to the world around him.

AfterSummon_14.speaker: Wyll
AfterSummon_14.text: You didn't think this through, did you?
AfterSummon_14.context: NodeContext: Wyll brings her hand to forehead. Rubbing her front lobes in disappointed disbelief.

AfterSummon_96.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_96.text: Well I'll be. I almost expected you to back out of our bargain.

AfterSummon_115.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_115.text: Yet I'm afraid I've but one last battle in me. Shall we renew our contract once more?
AfterSummon_115.context: NodeContext: Lump remains friendly, subduing a threatening nature.

AfterSummon_134.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_134.text: Instead, I propose a renewal. What say you?
AfterSummon_134.context: NodeContext: Lump remains friendly, subduing a threatening nature.

AfterSummon_94.speaker: Player
AfterSummon_94.text: All right. I'll pay now, and you come when I call. ([6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

AfterSummon_16.speaker: Player
AfterSummon_16.text: All right. I'll pay now, and you come when I call. ([6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

AfterSummon_27.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_27.text: Consider it a deal, my morsel.
AfterSummon_27.context: CinematicNodeContext: There is currently no character model for the oger, so we cannot be sure how he will place the gold into his pocket, so perhaps crop that part out of the view of the player, so we can only see the action itself.NodeContext: Lump The Enlightened has been given gold and has been satiated, for now.

AfterSummon_108.speaker: Player
AfterSummon_108.text: Agreed. You'll be paid for another battle - after it's done. ([5dac5eea-faeb-459c-b675-46c51519b784])

AfterSummon_149.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_149.text: Oh-ho! I appreciate your zeal - but I think we've all learned a lesson here about risk, yes?
AfterSummon_149.context: NodeContext: Lump is calm and keeps control of the situation, remaining threatening throughout.

AfterSummon_46.speaker: Lae'zel
AfterSummon_46.text: It's as I feared. You've lost your senses.

AfterSummon_79.speaker: Narrator
AfterSummon_79.text: *Reality dawns. You've been outsmarted by an ogre.*

AfterSummon_17.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_17.text: Why you succulent schemer! I know just the thing to sate my appetite.
AfterSummon_17.context: NodeContext: Lump is eager for battle and huger for the players flesh.

AfterSummon_102.speaker: Player
AfterSummon_102.text: Have patience. The spoils of the next battle will be far greater. ([01f129ea-b4dc-44b6-8154-9a948f876a82])

AfterSummon_62.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_62.text: You've got my mouth watering. We are agreed, morsel.

AfterSummon_142.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_142.text: Too good to be true, my morsel. Now pay up.

AfterSummon_140.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_140.text: No more than a few pecks? I'm afraid this spread is most inadequate.

AfterSummon_3.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_3.text: Our bargain is at an end - unless, perhaps, you've a spicier deal?
AfterSummon_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Rubbing for finger and thumb together illuding to the oger wanting gold.NodeContext: *Dupe* [Lump The Enlightened]  Rubbing for finger and thumb together illuding to the oger wanting gold. <JACK OF>

AfterSummon_118.speaker: Player
AfterSummon_118.text: If you'll help me in another battle, I'll pay ([6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

AfterSummon_1.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_1.text: A fine offer - we are back in business.
AfterSummon_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: There is currently no character model for the oger, so we cannot be sure how he will place the gold into his pocket, so perhaps crop that part out of the view of the player, so we can only see the action itself.NodeContext: Lump The Enlightened has been given gold and has been satiated, for now.

AfterSummon_68.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_68.text: You know my terms. Sound the horn when you are ready.
AfterSummon_68.context: NodeContext: Lump puts gold in pucket

AfterSummon_69.speaker: Player
AfterSummon_69.text: Our deal is done. I wish you well.

AfterSummon_117.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_117.text: Without so much as a lick of that mouth-watering meat of yours?

AfterSummon_61.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_61.text: A pity for us both. Until later.
AfterSummon_61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lump Bows in putting little effort into the action. Just enough thought was given to this bow for it to be considered a polite gesture.NodeContext: Lump

AfterSummon_13.speaker: Player
AfterSummon_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player extends arm to ogre.

AfterSummon_6.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Consider a less reveling angle so that individual player armor is not clipping thu Lump’s face.NodeContext: Lump is savoring your arm. treating it as a special treat, with much pomp and circumstance.

AfterSummon_131.speaker: Player
AfterSummon_131.text: I'll pay generously - after the next fight. ([463b0f43-5410-412d-aba3-875cf81c38ca])

AfterSummon_109.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_109.text: A fine offer - we are back in business.

AfterSummon_9.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_9.text: Come now - an ogre feasts not on promises.

AfterSummon_153.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_153.text: Why you succulent schemer! You promised meat, but offer nary a scrap!
AfterSummon_153.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ogre takes a look around and frowns.

AfterSummon_71.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
AfterSummon_71.text: But I know just the thing to sate my appetite.

PAD_NotReturning_0.speaker: Player
PAD_NotReturning_0.text: You can't summon a dead ogre, it turns out.

PAD_NotReturning_1.speaker: Player
PAD_NotReturning_1.text: Nothing. It's not really the time for an ogre rampage, anyhow.

PAD_NotReturning_3.speaker: Player
PAD_NotReturning_3.text: The ogre must have moved on to new deals.

Spotted_47.speaker: Chock
Spotted_47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ogres eating a corpse and remark on what it tastes like, custom scene viewer

Spotted_54.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_54.text: Gentlemen - contain yourselves. This quarrel sours our feast. Besides - taste like pork!

Spotted_37.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_37.text: Brothers, look here. I have eyed yet another prize. Fortune favours our bellies!

Spotted_42.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_42.text: Stranger: be you friend or food? The mark is Her measure: show us the brand of the Absolute.

Spotted_106.speaker: Player
Spotted_106.text: You're quite eloquent for an ogre.

Spotted_100.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_100.text: Am I not astonishing? A robust diet makes for a shrewd mind, you see. I am a gourmand...

Spotted_30.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_30.text: ... and you, a delicacy - were I so lucky.

Spotted_118.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_118.text: ... and you, a delicacy - unless you bear the mark, of course.

Spotted_19.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Lump grins a creepy, hungry grin.|NodeContext: A creepy hungry growl. After he kills the player, he plans to eat them.

Spotted_130.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_130.text: I see it. How regrettable, that your meat must go unsavoured.

Spotted_14.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_14.context: NodeContext: Should suddenly sound all ogre-ish and stupid. He's talking to his stupid brothers.

Spotted_51.speaker: Player
Spotted_51.text: You are quite the articulate ogre.

Spotted_40.speaker: Player
Spotted_40.text: I notice you don't bear a brand of your own.

Spotted_2.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_2.text: I've no use for the Absolute - or any god. I follow two masters only: gluttony and greed.

Spotted_25.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_25.text: The goblins understand my appetites. They sate my hunger for gold...

Spotted_142.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_142.text: ... and the rest sate my hunger for meat.

Spotted_132.speaker: Chock
Spotted_132.text: Boss goblin give gold. We check brand. Good deal!

Spotted_3.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Lump bonks Chock on the head. Chock rubs his head in response.|

Spotted_66.speaker: Player
Spotted_66.text: Forget goblins. You should be fighting for me.

Spotted_11.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_11.text: I am by all accounts a student of higher commerce and extortion.

Spotted_34.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_34.text: Make me an offer. Tempt me.

Spotted_63.speaker: Player
Spotted_63.text: I'll give you [6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54] gold if I can call you into battle.

Spotted_57.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_57.text: A serenade to my ears, and a boon to my belly. We've a bargain, my tasty kibble!

Spotted_9.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_9.text: Take my bonehorn. One blow, and the ground will quake with my family name.

Spotted_58.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_58.text: Use it when the need arises - and never a moment before.

Spotted_24.speaker: Chock
Spotted_24.text: Ogre kill everyone around! Then ogre eats them!

Spotted_60.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_60.text: Well spoken. Indeed, ogre 'kill everyone around'.
Spotted_60.context: NodeContext: Last bit he is echoing what the dumb ogre just said.

Spotted_43.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_43.text: We will keep close. When you are ready, sound the horn.

Spotted_140.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_140.text: Take my bonehorn. One blow, and... just a moment. It's been thieved - and I know the culprit.

Spotted_107.speaker: Player
Spotted_107.text: I'll give you [463b0f43-5410-412d-aba3-875cf81c38ca] gold - after you fight for me.

Spotted_135.speaker: Player
Spotted_135.text: How about I spare your life. That tempting enough?

Spotted_65.speaker: Player
Spotted_65.text: JOIN ME OR I'LL CRUSH YOU TO PULP!

Spotted_6.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_6.text: Come, now. Famished though we are, we're friends - are we not?

Spotted_119.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_119.text: Such sweet suggestions. Have a care - you may make yourself stringy.

Spotted_0.speaker: Player
Spotted_0.text: [463b0f43-5410-412d-aba3-875cf81c38ca] - to be paid once the killing's done.

Spotted_143.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_143.text: A twice-played serenade to my ears, my tasty kibble. We have a bargain!

Spotted_131.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_131.text: Come, now. An ogre feasts not on promises.

Spotted_83.speaker: Player
Spotted_83.text: [463b0f43-5410-412d-aba3-875cf81c38ca] gold - after you fight for me.

Spotted_45.speaker: Player
Spotted_45.text: I'll pay you in the flesh of the fallen - you'll have your fill.

Spotted_31.speaker: Player
Spotted_31.text: I'll pay you in the flesh of the fallen - you'll have your fill.

Spotted_70.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_70.text: A brilliant notion, and a boon to my aching belly. We have a deal, my tasty kibble!

Spotted_32.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_32.text: A slip of the tongue - you meant to make a better offer, surely.

Spotted_77.speaker: Player
Spotted_77.text: Fight for me and my oath or I'll cut the last meal from your belly.

Spotted_82.speaker: Player
Spotted_82.text: I've changed my mind. The offer is off the table.

Spotted_62.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_62.text: Oh, but you do love to tease.

Spotted_50.speaker: Player
Spotted_50.text: I've seen few other ogres in these parts.

Spotted_150.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_150.text: Mm - your candour makes you all the more enticing.

Spotted_86.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_86.text: We follow the scents of blood and gold to all lands fertile, friend.

Spotted_120.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_120.text: And this land proves particularly... fruitful.

Spotted_59.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_59.text: Alas - not so much as a nibble.

Spotted_105.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_105.context: NodeContext: Sigh at the beginning of the line. He is a tiny bit exasperated and sad

Spotted_110.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_110.text: How regrettable. Tell me, sweet creature: does your flesh taste as honeyed as I could hope for?

Spotted_90.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_90.text: Unh. You wound me, creature. I can hardly resist you.
Spotted_90.context: NodeContext: Absolutely stricken by this creature he would LOVE to eat

Spotted_88.speaker: Player
Spotted_88.text: I'll leave that to your imagination.

Spotted_95.speaker: Player
Spotted_95.text: I'll do you one better - I'm one of the Absolute's chosen disciples.

Spotted_46.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_46.text: Indeed? How regrettable, that your meat must go unsavoured.

Spotted_87.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_87.text: How regrettable. Tell me, sweet creature: does your flesh taste as honeyed as I could hope for?

Spotted_15.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_15.text: I expect more than your word. Show me your flesh.

Spotted_20.speaker: Player
Spotted_20.text: What about you? I'm feeling hungry...

Spotted_5.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_5.text: No one is food today, alas. It seems we are friends.

Spotted_94.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_94.text: An admirable instinct, but you're biting off more than you can chew.

Spotted_64.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_64.text: No, not food. Too tough for your digestion, I fear. Perhaps... friend, then?

Spotted_123.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_123.text: Such an uncouth outburst - I fear it may spoil the succulence of your meat.

Spotted_144.speaker: Player
Spotted_144.text: Try to eat me and I'll brand your corpse with the mark of my oath.

Spotted_52.speaker: Player
Spotted_52.text: Flash your arm at him. There you are. You could see the brand, could you not?

Spotted_89.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_89.text: Yes, yes - the mark is unmistakable. How regrettable, that your meat must go unsavoured.

Spotted_49.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_49.text: Yes, yes - the mark is unmistakable. Tell me, sweet creature: does your flesh taste as honeyed as I could hope for?

Spotted_27.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_27.text: Ha! Did you expect The Enlightened to fall for such a crude ruse?

Spotted_61.speaker: Player
Spotted_61.text: Do not test the Absolute's finest, ogre. You would not survive Her wrath.

Spotted_68.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_68.text: Spoken with the confidence only a True Soul could muster!

Spotted_13.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_13.text: How regrettable, that your meat must go unsavoured.

Spotted_8.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_8.text: Tell me, sweet creature: does your flesh taste as honeyed as I could hope for?

Spotted_35.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_35.text: She scampered in from the east, calling for 'Yul'. A pet, no doubt.
Spotted_35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Custom cam on gutted tiefling

Spotted_28.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_28.text: The green earth bless us, she bore no mark. Those horns - mm, mm. Such cartilaginous crunch!

Spotted_133.speaker: Lump the Enlightened
Spotted_133.text: Now let's see that mark, lest I give in to my cravings.

Spotted_129.speaker: Player
Spotted_129.text: These horns are not yours to take! Attack.
